## About Us {.text-center .mt-5}
Ernie Schenone Jr. leads our 3rd-generation Italian-American farm, growing sweet cherries and hearty walnuts in Linden, California. We bring fresh, hand-picked produce each week to San Diego’s vibrant markets.

## Where to Find Us {.text-center .mt-5}
Come visit us at Kobey’s Swap Meet in San Diego every weekend during cherry season (June–July). Follow us on Instagram @schenonefarms for updates.
